name: DLC - Don't Loot Crates
description:
In a world where DLC, Micro-transactions and Loot boxes run rampant, one man makes his stand. Fight through the office of the leading company behind terrible games and never ending micro-transactions against waves of company slaves and surprises to reach CEO of this greedy business.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Mouse movement - Aim

Left Click - Fire

Installing

To Install the game, download the ZIP file and extract it into your files and enjoy
